meanings.sent1: The heeled shoes were comfortable to walk in.
meanings.sent2: She wore heeled boots to the party.
meanings.sent3: The heeled sneakers made him look taller than he actually was.
meanings.sent4: Her heeled sandals clicked on the pavement as she walked.
meanings.sent5: The heeled loafers added a touch of elegance to his outfit.

meanings.definition: Equipped with a heel or heels.
meanings.sent1: The heeled chair had intricate carvings on its legs.
meanings.sent2: The heeled table wobbled on the uneven floor.
meanings.sent3: She tried to balance on the heeled stool but almost fell off.
meanings.sent4: The heeled ladder was not stable enough to climb.
meanings.sent5: The heeled bed frame added a touch of sophistication to the room.

meanings.definition: Having a specified kind of heel or number of heels.
meanings.sent1: The heeled boots had a chunky heel for extra support.
meanings.sent2: She preferred heeled shoes with a kitten heel.
meanings.sent3: His heeled sandals had a unique design on the heel.
meanings.sent4: The heeled clogs had a wooden heel that clacked on the floor.
meanings.sent5: The heeled pumps had a pointed heel that elongated her legs.

meanings.definition: Having a heel of a specified kind or height.
meanings.sent1: The heeled boots had a low heel for comfortable walking.
meanings.sent2: She chose heeled sandals with a medium heel for the beach.
meanings.sent3: His heeled shoes had a high heel that made him tower over others.
meanings.sent4: The heeled sneakers had a platform heel for a trendy look.
meanings.sent5: The heeled loafers had a modest heel suitable for everyday wear.

meanings.definition: Having a heel of a specified kind or number.
meanings.sent1: The heeled shoes had a single heel at the back.
meanings.sent2: She admired the heeled boots with a double heel design.
meanings.sent3: His heeled sandals had a triple heel that was unique.
meanings.sent4: The heeled clogs had a quadruple heel for added stability.
meanings.sent5: The heeled pumps had a row of small heels along the back.
